hedline.hl1: Lyrics in an Instant, No Talent Required

abstract.p: Variety of Web sites can generate musical lyrics; one type of site creates new lyrics typical of a particular artist or genre, while another type creates songs out of key words entered by user; site addresses noted; photo (M)

block.p: MUSICAL lyrics, perhaps more than most art forms, range from the inspiring to the inane. With an eye on the latter, lyric generators have turned up on the Web, supplying characteristic lyrics for songs in the musical genre of your choice.

Choosing from country music generators that know the long road from ''flirt'' to ''hurt'' or Goth-inspired generators that will search for that perfect rhyme for ''pierced skin'' (''fierce kin''?), phonetically challenged songsmiths and Web surfers looking for distraction can now pick up the mouse and sit back as the poetry springs forth from the computer screen.

MUSICAL lyrics, perhaps more than most art forms, range from the inspiring to the inane. With an eye on the latter, lyric generators have turned up on the Web, supplying characteristic lyrics for songs in the musical genre of your choice.

Choosing from country music generators that know the long road from ''flirt'' to ''hurt'' or Goth-inspired generators that will search for that perfect rhyme for ''pierced skin'' (''fierce kin''?), phonetically challenged songsmiths and Web surfers looking for distraction can now pick up the mouse and sit back as the poetry springs forth from the computer screen.

For the most part there are two types of lyric generators. One creates new lyrics typical of a particular artist or genre each time you click on the generator button. The other asks you to fill in various words, which are then used in the lyrics of your new song.

While it may be more entertaining to use your own material, some automatic lyric generators have captured the spirit of the original artists.
